description: Manage tables for log analytics workspace.

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics workspace table create
commands.summary: Create a Log Analytics workspace microsoft/custom log table. The table name needs to end with '_CL'.
commands.syntax:
az monitor log-analytics workspace table create --name
                                                --resource-group
                                                --workspace-name
                                                [--columns]
                                                [--description]
                                                [--no-wait]
                                                [--plan {Analytics, Basic}]
                                                [--retention-time]
                                                [--total-retention-time]
examples: az monitor log-analytics workspace table create --resource-group MyResourceGroup --workspace-name MyWorkspace -n MyTable_CL --retention-time 45 --columns MyColumn1=string TimeGenerated=datetime

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics workspace table delete
commands.summary: Delete a Log Analytics workspace table.
commands.syntax:
az monitor log-analytics workspace table delete [--ids]
                                                [--name]
                                                [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                [--resource-group]
                                                [--subscription]
                                                [--workspace-name]
                                                [--yes]

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics workspace table list
commands.summary: List all the tables for the given Log Analytics workspace.
commands.syntax:
az monitor log-analytics workspace table list --resource-group
                                              --workspace-name
examples: az monitor log-analytics workspace table list --resource-group MyResourceGroup --workspace-name MyWorkspace

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics workspace table migrate
commands.summary: Migrate a Log Analytics table from support of the Data Collector API and Custom Fields features to support of Data Collection Rule-based Custom Logs.
commands.syntax:
az monitor log-analytics workspace table migrate [--ids]
                                                 [--resource-group]
                                                 [--subscription]
                                                 [--table-name]
                                                 [--workspace-name]
examples: az monitor log-analytics workspace table migrate --resource-group MyResourceGroup --workspace-name MyWorkspace -n MyTable_CL

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics workspace table show
commands.summary: Get a Log Analytics workspace table.
commands.syntax:
az monitor log-analytics workspace table show [--ids]
                                              [--name]
                                              [--resource-group]
                                              [--subscription]
                                              [--workspace-name]
examples: az monitor log-analytics workspace table show --resource-group MyResourceGroup --workspace-name MyWorkspace -n MyTable

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics workspace table update
commands.summary: Update the properties of a Log Analytics workspace table.
commands.syntax:
az monitor log-analytics workspace table update --name
                                                --resource-group
                                                --workspace-name
                                                [--columns]
                                                [--description]
                                                [--no-wait]
                                                [--plan {Analytics, Basic}]
                                                [--retention-time]
                                                [--total-retention-time]
examples: az monitor log-analytics workspace table update --resource-group MyResourceGroup --workspace-name MyWorkspace -n MyTable --retention-time 30

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics workspace table wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
commands.syntax:
az monitor log-analytics workspace table wait [--created]
                                              [--custom]
                                              [--deleted]
                                              [--exists]
                                              [--ids]
                                              [--interval]
                                              [--name]
                                              [--resource-group]
                                              [--subscription]
                                              [--timeout]
                                              [--updated]
                                              [--workspace-name]
